programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Clip show. Joey bumbles down memory lane while being interviewed by a soap-opera magazine, while the gang takes on the full-time job of making sure he doesnt say anything stupid..

programme.title: Friends
programme.Sub-title: The One with the Baby Shower
programme.desc: Monica incurs the wrath of Mrs. Green by forgetting to invite her to Rachels baby shower, where the mum-to-be begins to see that she may not be ready for motherhood after all. Meanwhile, Ross and Chandler help Joey prep for an audition to host the worlds worst game show..

programme.title: Friends
programme.Sub-title: The One with the Cooking Class
programme.desc: Rosss date with a baby-furniture saleswoman brings out the brat in Rachel; Joey and Monica sneak into a cooking class after a bad review sends the crestfallen chef on a mission to disprove her detractor; Phoebe teaches Chandler how to interview for a new job without annoying his future boss..

programme.title: Friends
programme.Sub-title: The One Where Rachel Is Late
programme.desc: A week past her due date, a grumpy Rachels only hopes for inducing labour include spicy foods and something even spicier with Ross. programme.title: Friends
programme.Sub-title: The One Where Rachel Has a Baby
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. Rachel goes into labour, while in the waiting room, Chandler tests Monicas patience with his change of heart about starting a family and Phoebe flirts with a patient..

programme.title: Friends
programme.Sub-title: The One Where Rachel Has a Baby
programme.desc: Conclusion. The birth of Ross and Rachels baby leads to a surprising turn of events for the proud parents..

programme.title: Friends
programme.Sub-title: The One Where No One Proposes
programme.desc: At the hospital, Rachel thinks Joey proposed, Phoebe thinks Ross did and no one knows how to tell the other the truth. In the meantime, Monica and Chandler revisit the janitors closet in an effort to conceive..

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Emmas crying jag has Rachel nearly hysterical herself; Joeys effort to apologise for his semi-proposal proves all-too painful for Ross; and a sleep-deprived Chandler nods off in a staff meeting and wakes up with a nightmarish new job in Tulsa..

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey sets Phoebe up with a stranger to score a date with one of her friends; Rachel catches Ross visiting his pediatrician from childhood; and a job offer stands between Monica and Chandlers relocation to Tulsa..

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross makes up a faux beau for Pheebs after telling her latest crush too much about her lack of long-term loves. programme.title: Friends
programme.Sub-title: The One with Phoebes Birthday Dinner
programme.desc: Phoebes birthday dinner is stalled by Rachels refusal to leave Emma at home. Elsewhere, the Bings feud over Chandlers return to smoking..

programme.title: Children Ruin Everything
programme.desc: James plans to meet friends to do their yearly fantasy baseball draft, while Astrid cannot shake the feeling that all those hours of parental duty have eaten away at her old friendships. When Viv hits it off with another girl at the park, Astrid finds herself jumping at accompanying her on a playdate for the adult interaction, even if its with the polar opposite Disaster Mom. Meanwhile, James commitment to his friends is put in jeopardy..

programme.title: Children Ruin Everything
programme.desc: Astrid feels on the back foot and disconnected from her younger co-workers following embarrassing run-ins with her boss and co-workers. When she goes to her sister Dawn for advice, Astrid realizes her best move might be to attend a drink night with the rest of her team, if she can shake off the exhaustion and rust long enough to fit in in at the trendy bar. Back at home, James is recovering from vasectomy surgery, but his attempts to follow the doctors orders are put to the test..

programme.title: Children Ruin Everything
programme.desc: Astrid and James enact a weekend screen ban, but when Astrid inadvertently takes on an assignment at work and James gets put in charge of his companys social media accounts, leading by example becomes more complicated than they originally thought. In a bid to get some work done, James takes the older kids to the park to distract them while he sneaks in some social media updates and Astrid stays home to put the baby down for a nap before launching into her own assignment..

programme.desc: A heartbroken Kimberly considers cheating on an exam; Leightons fear of coming out upends her weekend getaway with Alicia; Bela navigates the fallout of exposing assault; Whitney confronts the truth about Dalton.

programme.title: The Sex Lives of College Girls
programme.desc: While Kimberly faces possible expulsion after her honor code violation, Bela takes a stand against the Catullans culture, Whitney levels with her mom, and Leighton speaks her truth.

programme.title: Taken Together: Who Killed Lyric and Elizabeth?
programme.desc: Known as "the case that haunts the Midwest," the series dives into the 2012 double abduction of two cousins, 10-year-old Lyric Cook-Morrissey and 8-year-old Elizabeth Collins, in Evansdale, Iowa.

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: During World War IIs Battle of Okinawa, U.S. Army medic Desmond Doss (Andrew Garfield) braves bullets, grenades and snipers while single-handedly evacuating the wounded from behind enemy lines. Starring Andrew Garfield, Sam Worthington, Luke Bracey.

programme.title: Tautuktavuk
programme.desc: After experiencing a traumatic event, Uyarak leaves her community to live in Montréal. When COVID-19 lockdowns close off the Canadian Arctic, Uyarak is further separated from her closest friend, eldest sister Saqpinak. Starring Carol Kunnuk, Lucy Tulugarjuk, Benjamin Kunuk.

programme.title: The Minute You Wake Up Dead
programme.desc: When a shady small-town stockbroker begins dating a shy waitress, a shocking murder takes place -- and one of them may be responsible. As word leaks out that theres money behind the killing, every criminal in town wants their share of the cash. Starring Cole Hauser, Jaimie Alexander, Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: Guest of Honour
programme.desc: A father confronts his 20-year-old daughter, who is in prison for a sexual assault. Their relationship will become more complicated when the past resurfaces. Starring David Thewlis, Laysla De Oliveira, Luke Wilson.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
programme.desc: Frodo (Elijah Wood) and Sam march toward Mount Doom to destroy the ring, while Gandalf (Ian McKellen) and warriors prepare for a final confrontation with Sauron and his allies. Starring Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Liv Tyler.

programme.desc: Superfan filmmaker Kat Jayme investigates the abrupt move of her NBA hometown team, the Vancouver Grizzlies, to Memphis in 2001. Much more than a sore spot, its an unsolved mystery and possibly a criminal conspiracy.

programme.desc: A recently widowed man and his two teenage daughters travel to a game reserve in South Africa. However, their journey of healing soon turns into a fight for survival when a bloodthirsty lion starts to stalk them. Starring Idris Elba, Sharlto Copley, Iyana Halley.

programme.title: Destroyer
programme.desc: As a young cop, Erin Bell went under cover to infiltrate a gang in the California desert -- with tragic results. When the gang leader re-emerges, Bell embarks on an obsessive quest to bring him to justice and make peace with her tortured past. Starring Nicole Kidman, Toby Kebbell, Tatiana Maslany.

programme.title: Crisis
programme.desc: A drug trafficker organizes a smuggling operation while a recovering addict seeks the truth behind her sons disappearance. Starring Gary Oldman, Armie Hammer, Evangeline Lilly.

programme.title: The Nature of Love
programme.desc: Sophias comfortable life turns upside down the day she meets Sylvain, and she leaves everything for a new, burning passion. Starring Magalie Lépine Blondeau, Pierre-Yves Cardinal, Francis-William Rhéaume.

programme.title: Riceboy Sleeps
programme.desc: A Korean single mother raises her teenage son in the suburbs of 1990s Canada, determined to provide a better life for him than the one she left behind. Starring Choi Seungyoon, Ethan Hwang, Dohyun Noel-Hwang.

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Gloria and her grandfather Bud befriend a mysterious reindeer when the family gathers for Christmas. Bud comes to believe that Prancer may actually be magical, but Gloria fears his theory will send him straight to a retirement home. Starring James Cromwell, Joseph Millson, Holly Hayes.

programme.title: Elliot: The Littlest Reindeer
programme.desc: When Blitzen decides to retire, a miniature horse named Elliot is given the chance to earn a place on Santas sleigh team during the North Pole tryouts. Starring Josh Hutcherson, Samantha Bee, Martin Short.

programme.title: Float
programme.desc: When her plans suddenly change, young Waverly takes an impulsive detour to a small Canadian town. After nearly drowning at a beach party, she soon finds herself falling in love with the handsome lifeguard who rescued her. Starring Andrea Bang, Robbie Amell, Michelle Krusiec.

programme.desc: Interviews and archival footage provide insight into the extraordinary life and legacy of Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis.

Starring François Civil, Vincent Cassel, Romain Duris.

programme.title: Dio: Dreamers Never Die
programme.desc: The extraordinary life and career of Ronnie James Dio, the iconic heavy metal singer of such bands as Black Sabbath, Dio and Rainbow. Starring Ronnie James Dio, Wendy Dio, Tony Iommi.

programme.desc: Brent and Karen go to war over the antiquated laws in Dog River; Hank and Emma track down Oscars prize quarter.

programme.desc: An assassin attempts to kill President Reagan; Stan pressures his source within the Rezidentura to find out if the KGB was responsible for an attempted assassination.

programme.title: Eighth Grade
programme.desc: Thirteen-year-old Kayla endures the tidal wave of contemporary suburban adolescence as she makes her way through the last week of middle school -- the end of her thus far disastrous eighth-grade year. Starring Elsie Fisher, Daniel Zolghadri, Fred Hechinger.

programme.title: Falcon Lake
programme.desc: Bastien and Chloé spend summer vacation with their families at a lake cabin in Quebec that is haunted by a ghost legend. Despite the age gap between them, the two teenagers form a singular bond. Starring Joseph Engel, Sara Montpetit, Monia Chokri.

programme.title: Swarmed
programme.desc: Deadly wasps threaten a small town after a scientist (Michael Shanks) accidentally releases them. Starring Michael Shanks, Carol Alt, Ellen Dubin.

programme.title: The Philadelphia Experiment
programme.desc: Government researchers try to re-create the 1943 "Philadelphia Experiment" to cloak warships, but their success has unintended consequences, forcing the survivor of the original experiment and his granddaughter to combat the death and destruction. Starring Nicholas Lea, Michael Paré, Ryan Robbins.

programme.title: Pig
programme.desc: Living alone in the Oregon wilderness, a truffle hunter returns to Portland to find the person who stole his beloved pig. Starring Nicolas Cage, Alex Wolff, Adam Arkin.

programme.title: Fanny: The Right to Rock
programme.desc: The story of a Filipina American garage band that morphed into the ferocious rock group Fanny, which almost became the female version of the Beatles.

programme.desc: Now divided, members of a fellowship take different paths to destroy the ring and defeat evil Sauron and his pawns. Starring Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Liv Tyler.

programme.desc: Exploring the latest thinking and technological advancements in AI.

programme.title: Transplant
programme.desc: Bash faces an ethical dilemma, caught between a gang member with a gunshot wound and the police officer looking for him.

programme.title: When Morning Comes
programme.desc: After his mother decides to relocate their family from Jamaica to Canada, young Jamal runs off to spend time with his best friend, the girl he likes, and his substitute father figures. He also visits the grave of his beloved father one last time. Starring Djamari Roberts, Shaquana Wilson, Jarden Crooks.

programme.title: All Dirt Roads Taste of Salt
programme.desc: A lyrical, decades-spanning exploration of a Black womans life in Mississippi, winding through love and heartbreak. Starring Charleen McClure, Moses Ingram, Kaylee Nicole Johnson.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Torn apart from her sister and her children, Celie faces many hardships, including an abusive husband. With support from a singer and her stepdaughter, she ultimately finds extraordinary strength in the unbreakable bonds of a new kind of sisterhood. Starring Fantasia Barrino, Taraji P. Henson, Danielle Brooks.

programme.desc: Karen and Davis try to uncover why Karen suddenly has violently angry feelings toward Hank; the citizens of Dog River are captivated by the Leroys new swing; Brent, Wanda and Lacey butt heads over aromatherapy.

programme.title: Law and Order
programme.desc: The murder of a corrections officer leads detectives to a womens prison where a guard was linked to an inmate Carmichael put away on drug charges.

programme.title: The Americans
programme.desc: A crucial agent crumbles under emotional distress and threatens to topple a valuable network of KGB informants; Philip and Elizabeth are tasked with infiltrating the FBIs new communications encryption system.

programme.title: Prince Andrew: Banished
programme.desc: The story of how, through arrogance and lust, Prince Andrews scandals and his friendship with sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein nearly sank the British monarchy.

programme.title: Tarot
programme.desc: Friends unwittingly unleash an unspeakable evil trapped within a cursed deck of tarot cards. One by one, they come face to face with fate, racing against death to escape the future foretold in their readings. Starring Harriet Slater, Adain Bradley, Avantika.

programme.title: Up in the Air (2009)
programme.desc: Ryan Bingham works for a company that specialises in firing people, and hes forced to take a newcomer named Natalie along on a business trip in order to show her firsthand what he does. Along the way, Ryan begins to reflect on his lonely life and develops a relationship with fellow frequent flyer Alex Goran..

programme.title: Get Shorty (1995)
programme.desc: John Travolta shines in this adaptation of Elmore Leonards novel about a movie-loving loan shark who pitches a story idea to a producer while collecting a debt..

programme.title: White Men Cant Jump (1992)
programme.desc: A white con artist hustles basketball games against black players who dont realize he is actually a gifted hoopster, and one of his unsuspecting victims becomes his "agent," arranging his various scams around L.A., and the duo quickly start piling up the wins together..

programme.title: The Family (2013)
programme.desc: An American mob boss and his family are relocated to France through the Witness Protection Program, but they soon draw the attention of some dangerous underworld figures who are determined to see them dead..

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai (2019)
programme.desc: The staff and visitors of the Taj Mahal Palace Hotel struggle to deal with the 2008 Mumbai attacks. Over the course of a few days, they try to survive an encounter with Pakistani terrorists who are each armed with high-end weapons and explosives..

programme.title: The Exception (2016)
programme.desc: An SS captain is assigned as the new head of security for Germanys former ruler, Kaiser Wilhelm II, who was exiled to the Netherlands after WWI. However, the position is really a cover for his pursuit of a spy who is sabotaging the Nazi war effort..

programme.title: Trumbo (2015)
programme.desc: Biopic of blacklisted screenwriter Dalton Trumbo, whose career was destroyed by anticommunists when he refused to testify before the House Un-American Activities Committee..

programme.title: Krisha (2016)
programme.desc: A 60-year-old recovering addict spends Thanksgiving with her family after a decade of estrangement. However, her relatives are still skeptical of her progress; particularly a nephew whom she desperately wishes to reconnect with..

programme.title: Son of the Pink Panther (1993)
programme.desc: The eighth and last of the Pink Panther series. The illegitimate son of Inspector Clouseau is on the case of the kidnapped Princess Yasmin..

programme.title: Just Wright (2010)
programme.desc: In this crowd-pleasing romantic comedy, a tough-talking physical therapist named Leslie Wright (Queen Latifah) is hired to rehab an injured NBA star, whose fiancée leaves him when it looks like his career is over. Eventually, Leslie finds herself falling for the athlete and she discovers the feeling may be mutual. But after his rehab is complete, his fiancée returns to reclaim her man. Directed by Sanaa Hamri..

programme.desc: Teenager Daniel spends a summer in Cape Cod. He gets into the drug-dealing business, but gets romantically involved with his business partners sister at the same time. During a summer that is filled with parties and arcades, tensions rise during an incoming hurricane..

programme.desc: Genetic engineers Clive and Elsa experiment with human DNA to create a highly intelligent female human-animal hybrid called Dren, which begins displaying traits that signal she may be the next step in evolution. But Dren is about to make one final, shocking metamorphosis..

programme.desc: Shakespeares "Othello" inspired this drama about a black athlete who wins a scholarship to an all-white school. Although Odins future seems bright, a jealous friend tries to make the star athlete believe that his girlfriend is cheating on him..

Meanwhile, Gloria is irked by Jays apparent favouritism when it comes to Joes improper gifts and Mannys dating insecurity; Cam and Mitch urge Lily, Haley and gal pal Sal to stand up to the men in their lives; and Alex learns she has a secret admirer..

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil eyes a property hes always had a desire to develop and wants Jay to be a co-investor. Meanwhile, Claires fondness for a TV chef leads to a new love of cooking Sunday dinners; Mitch and Cam try to teach Lily the value of hard work; and Jay feels left out when Gloria hires a coach for Joe who doubles as a handyman..

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Cam goes to the hospital with a head injury, but is leery of having an MRI due to a childhood incident in a well on the family farm. Meanwhile, Phil and Jays real-estate investment may not turn out to be the dream scenario Phil hoped it would be; and Glorias birthday gift for Claire rubs her employees the wrong way after budget cuts at the closet company..

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Franks bachelor party gives Phil a chance to meet his new stepbrother. Meanwhile, Cam is outraged that someone is dragging Fizbos name through the mud; and Gloria, Claire and Haley have their own reasons for being unnerved by a play Manny wrote for a young playwright festival..

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil tries to rebound from a disastrous turn in last years charity basketball game by practicing day and night, but the pressure is on when renowned hoopsters Charles Barkley and DeAndre Jordan show up this time and start making bets. Meanwhile, Glorias nemesis calls out her lack of support at Mannys school; Claire tries to keep Jay from finding out about a work mistake; and Jay worries that Joe just isnt afraid of him at all..

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mitchell knocks over an urn filled with the ashes of Camerons beloved pet pig Lilly while exercising in the garage, but Cameron suspects his cover-up is a load of hogwash..

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: A look at 300 seconds in the lives of the Pritchett-Dunphy-Tucker clan includes Mitch and Cam hurrying to catch a flight for which they prematurely took sleeping pills; Haley and Rainer re-evaluating their relationship at dinner before his birthday cake arrives; Phil and Claire meeting Alexs new boyfriend; and Manny trying to find a parking spot at the movies while Jay and Gloria argue..

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Frank Dunphys wedding has a Roaring 20s theme, so Phil gets his clan to show up in costume, but Claire and the kids realise its time for an intervention with Phil when theyre the only ones who dressed up. Meanwhile, Jay comes to regret mastering the art of saying "no"; and Cam finally gets the courage to stand up to his sister Pam..

programme.title: Family Matters
programme.desc: Steve hopes to get into the choir at the Winslows church, but hes kicked out by new choir director Rachel. Pastor Peeble: Ron Taylor. Choir: The First A.M.E. Church Choir. Steve: Jaleel White..

programme.title: Family Matters
programme.desc: The Winslows are ripped off when Carl dozes off; Urkel takes the heat when helping Eddie cheat on a chemistry exam. Mr. Howard: Patrick Cronin. Langweaver: Howard George. Ned: Gary McGurk..

programme.title: Family Matters
programme.desc: Visiting cousin Clarence is a dude ready for action in the Winslow hood, and who proves to be a bad influence on Eddie (Darius McCrary). Judy: Jaimee Foxworth. Mother Winslow: Rosetta LeNoire..

programme.title: Family Matters
programme.desc: Mother Winslows family history bores the Winslow kids, but she regales Eddies peers with tales of her fighter-pilot husband and of World War IIs Tuskegee Airman. Mother Winslow: Rosetta LeNoire. Urkel: Jaleel White..

programme.title: Family Matters
programme.desc: Urkel enrolls in a home-ec class with Laura, assuming it will be a piece of cake. Ms. Steuben: Susan Krebs. Cassie Lynn: Kim Valentine. Waldo: Shawn Harrison. Vonda: Danielle Nicolet. Richie: Bryton McClure..

programme.Sub-title: Pongo Pygmaeus and a Culture that Encourages Spitting
programme.desc: Sheldon starts an internet flame war, and Missy stands up to the boys on her baseball team. Also, Meemaw is unhappy when George Sr. spends time with her new boyfriend..

programme.title: Young Sheldon

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.Sub-title: Teenager Soup and a Little Ball of Fib

programme.title: Young Sheldon

programme.title: Friends

programme.title: Friends

programme.title: Friends

programme.title: Friends

programme.title: Friends
programme.Sub-title: The One with the Worst Best Man Ever

programme.title: Friends

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Penny fight, and Sheldon mediates..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: After the guys, except for Sheldon, go camping, Penny is injured and left with only Sheldon to come to her rescue..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is humiliated on National Public Radio and vows vengeance on Kripke; and Wolowitz begins a relationship with Katee Sackhoff..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to teach Penny physics so shell understand Leonards work; Wolowitz is jealous when Leonard bonds with his girlfriend..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonards mother visits, which pleases Sheldon but upsets Leonard..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon helps Koothrappali pick up women at a university mixer; and Leonard is shocked to learn that Penny believes in psychics..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldons apartment is robbed, so they create an elaborate security system with the help of their friends..

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: All Elite Wrestling: Dynamite
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling continues to inject new spirit, freshness and energy into to mainstream wrestling, featuring a world-class roster of diverse male and female wrestlers..

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: From bombing job interviews to trashing their Nonas sauce, the Jokers are not on their game this week, with one Loser being punished by confronting cellphone users in this nail-biting punishment!.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: Uh oh! Kicking good people out and stealing from strangers is whats on the agenda for the Jokers this week, with one of them ruining the entire night of a whole sports bar in tonights big punishment!.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Support for gender equality and the womens movement is displayed by various members of the Pritchett clan, but each has vastly different ways of showing their commitment. Meanwhile, Jay and Phil cant agree on their parking-lot attendants duties; and Cam is shocked when Pam prefers Mitchs help raising her baby..

programme.title: The Upside of Anger
programme.desc: An ex-ballplayer (Kevin Costner) befriends a mother (Joan Allen) of four who has hovered in a boozy funk since her husband abandoned her.

programme.title: Monsters and Men
programme.desc: Tensions rise when a young man records a police officer shooting a black motorist in a Brooklyn, N.Y., neighborhood.

programme.desc: Jealous of his popularity, a teenager (Josh Hartnett) at a private school hatches a scheme to ruin his basketball teammates (Mekhi Phifer) life.

programme.desc: The prison-bound manager (Will Ferrell) of a hedge fund asks a black businessman (Kevin Hart) -- who has never been to jail -- to prepare him for life behind bars.

programme.desc: In 1990s Los Angeles, a 13-year-old spends his summer navigating between a troubled home life and a crew of new friends he meets at a skate shop.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 3
programme.desc: Psychic Elise Rainier (Lin Shaye) reluctantly agrees to use her ability to converse with the dead to help a teenage girl (Stefanie Scott) who is being tormented by a dangerous supernatural entity.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: Violent drifter Mikael passes the young, impressionable Johannes on the road and offers him a lift in his stolen car. The two form a master-apprentice relationship and begin living outside the law in 1920s Norway.

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: When the San Andreas fault triggers a magnitude 9 earthquake, a search-and-rescue helicopter pilot (Dwayne Johnson) must navigate the destruction from Los Angeles to San Francisco to bring his estranged wife (Carla Gugino) and daughter to safety.

programme.desc: A fugitive special forces team leaves mayhem in their wake in this action-packed update of the classic 1980s TV series.

programme.desc: Tiny aliens explore the wilderness of New York City in a human-sized spaceship modeled after their captain (Eddie Murphy).

programme.desc: An airport security agent (Jay Baruchel) must figure out how to make the relationship work when a beautiful, successful woman (Alice Eve) falls in love with him.

programme.desc: A forensic psychiatrist (Al Pacino) must use all his skills and training to find the person who issued an ominous death threat.

programme.desc: A liberal-minded couple are forced to reconsider their image of their adopted son after he writes a disturbing essay for a class assignment.

programme.desc: A 90-year-old atheist has outlived and out-smoked his contemporaries, and as he comes to terms with his own mortality, he searches for ever-elusive enlightenment.

programme.title: The Hole in the Ground
programme.desc: One night, Sarahs young son disappears into the woods behind their rural home. When he returns, he looks the same, but his behavior grows increasingly disturbing. Sarah begins to believe that the boy who returned may not be her son at all.

programme.desc: After her best friend commits suicide, an unpopular girl (Emily Bergl) discovers she has telekinetic powers and uses them to seek revenge on her humiliators.

programme.title: The Last Stand
programme.desc: A sheriff (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must take matters into his own hands when a notorious drug lord escapes from FBI custody and comes speeding toward a showdown in the lawmans quiet border town.

programme.desc: The grown children of an overbearing Chinese matriarch reluctantly gather to take part in seven days worth of traditional funeral rites.

programme.title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampires Assistant
programme.desc: After a sideshow vampire (John C. Reilly) turns a teenager into one of the undead, the kid becomes a pawn between warring supernatural factions.

programme.desc: A 1920s football star (George Clooney) tries to give his sagging sport a boost, while he and a new teammate (John Krasinski) vie for the affections of a feisty newswoman (Renée Zellweger).

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Teddy bear Ted (Seth MacFarlane) seeks legal help from a young lawyer (Amanda Seyfried) and a legendary, civil-rights attorney (Morgan Freeman) when the law declares him to be property and not a person.

programme.desc: A young couple (Katie Featherston, Micah Sloat) move into their first new home but are disturbed by what appears to be a supernatural presence that is most active at night.
